pages.text: Once sprouting only where patches of concentrated moonlight struck the earth, it can now be re-created in the heat of a $(l:crafting/pyres)pyre$().$(br2)Once crafted, the plant becomes $(l:herbs/moonglow_leaf#anchor)renewable$() once more.$(br2)Commonly associated with twilight, it bridges the gap between light and darkness. This herb can even be used to manipulate time itself.

pages.title: Renewability
pages.text: Once obtained, the leafs can be broken down into seeds and planted on any farmland that supports the growth of normal crops.$(br2)When mature as a cluster of intertwined leafs, harvesting it will produce additional seeds.
